marklogic.body: Put the Fords together they would be lucky to have the IQ of a lab mouse , promising subways, with out having the jingle to pay for it, what of Harper calls and says the loan shark has cut me Off , i already owe them 100,s of billions of dollars sorry Rob and Doug, you are on your own, same as Mcguinty, he has Bled the loan shark dry too, this could turn out be a disaster for all three of the morons, yet us taxpayers will be left to face the loan sharks while these three fack ups run and hide!!
